Identity.Name: Swazlid Queen
Identity.Basic_Description: A Large lizard queen ant with a massive thorax

Abilities.Name: Spawn Swarm
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, roll a d20. on a roll of 10 or less create a swazlid swarm unit.

Abilities.Name: Spawn Worker
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, roll a d20. on a roll of 4 or less create a swazlid swarm unit.

Abilities.Name: Spawn Brute
Abilities.Ability: Once per turn as an action, roll a d20. on a roll of 1 create a swazlid swarm unit.
